movie-description: Long-running news/talk show hosted by TV veteran Larry King. Each week, King brings on a series of guests for in depths, one-on-one interviews. His choice of guests is often controversial, sometimes unpopular, but almost always newsworthy.
movie-short-description: With Larry King, Bill Maher, Bob Woodward, Ryan Seacrest. Popular and controversial journalist Larry King hosts this CNN call-in talk show.
